title: verify-1: Snake curve reproduction (log-scale loss/accuracy)
description: Verify plotting routines produce the grokking 'snake' curve with log-scale steps: train loss/accuracy drop immediately, test loss/accuracy remain flat then crash. Add tests for log-axis usage and curve-shape checks from recorded metrics.
acceptance_criteria: Plotting uses logarithmic x-axis; curve-shape checks confirm early train convergence and delayed test collapse; failures if log scale or phase ordering is wrong.

title: verify-1: Model architecture matches 1-layer toy transformer spec
description: Verify model config matches NOTES.md: decoder-only transformer, 1 layer, d_model=128, n_heads=4 (d_head=32), d_mlp=512, ReLU activation, learned positional embeddings (len=3), no LayerNorm (or optional pre-RMSNorm if explicitly chosen), biases enabled, causal masking enabled. Add unit tests that assert config/weights reflect these properties and that forward path uses causal mask.
acceptance_criteria: Tests fail if layer count, activation, normalization type, head dims, or positional embedding length differ from spec; attention uses causal mask; token/position embeddings are learned and sized correctly; biases are present.
close_reason: Aligned transformer to 1-layer spec with causal masking and added config/embedding/bias/activation tests.

title: Upgrade burn to latest and resolve API changes
verify-1: Grokking phase transition appears in loss/accuracy curves
description: Implement an integration verification that training exhibits the three phases from NOTES.md: early train accuracy ~100% while test accuracy ~1/p, a prolonged plateau, then sharp test-loss/accuracy transition. Use logged metrics to detect a delayed generalization window (e.g., test accuracy stays near chance for N steps, then rises steeply within M steps).
acceptance_criteria: Verification asserts: train accuracy reaches >99% early; test accuracy remains near chance until after a configurable minimum step threshold; test accuracy then rises to >99% within a bounded window; test loss drops sharply after plateau.

title: verify-1: Excluded loss metric detects memorization reliance
description: Add verification for Excluded Loss (zero out top-k Fourier frequencies only). Evaluate train loss with these components removed and verify it spikes as grokking approaches.
acceptance_criteria: Excluded loss computation implemented; training loss with top-k removed increases sharply near grokking; metric trend is logged and testable.
close_reason: Implemented excluded loss computation and spike verification; logged excluded loss snapshots and saved history.

title: Test issue for sync workflow
verify-1: MLP neuron activation waves are rectified sinusoids
description: Create verification to sweep x=0..p-1 (holding y fixed or using x-only inputs) and capture post-ReLU MLP activations. Quantify periodicity and rectification (non-negative, sine-like waveform).
acceptance_criteria: For selected neurons, activation vs input shows strong correlation with sinusoid at dominant frequency and minimal negative values; tests fail if activations are noisy or aperiodic post-grok.
close_reason: Added MLP post-ReLU activation wave verification with FFT/correlation checks and synthetic tests.

title: verify-1: FFT dominant frequencies match modulus structure
description: Add verification for FFT analysis of embeddings/weights that dominant frequencies align with modulus p (113). Quantify histogram peaks at expected frequencies and ensure nontrivial spectral structure post-grok.
acceptance_criteria: FFT analysis shows dominant frequency peaks consistent with p=113; test fails if spectrum resembles white noise or lacks expected peaks.

title: verify-1: 7x7 phase-space grid shows ring manifolds post-grok
description: Add verification that pairwise neuron activations (post-ReLU) form ring/ellipse manifolds post-grok and noisy scatter pre-grok. Use saved checkpoints to compare pre- and post-grok behavior and quantify circularity (e.g., fit ellipse, compare explained variance).
acceptance_criteria: Pre-grok pairwise plots score low on circularity metrics; post-grok plots exceed threshold for multiple neuron pairs; verification uses a 7x7 subset of neurons as in NOTES.md.

title: verify-1: Weight norm decay aligns with grokking transition
description: Implement verification that L2 weight norm decreases over training with weight decay and correlates with grokking transition (memorization -> low-norm solution).
acceptance_criteria: Weight norm tracking implemented; norms decrease over time and show a noticeable shift around grokking; tests fail if norms are flat or increasing under weight decay.

title: verify-1: Training hyperparameters follow grokking spec

acceptance_criteria: Tests assert projected points have low radial variance, cover full 0..2π range, and token ordering around the circle matches index progression (mod p).
